article.title: TCOM to Provide Aerostat Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: TCOM L.P., Columbia, Maryland, is being awarded a $12,354,993 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of hardware in support of phase three of the Persistent Ground Surveillance Systems (PGSS) for the Navy. Hardware to be provided includes three 28M+ aerostat systems and three site spares to outfit and enhance the capabilities of the existing PGSS currently fielded. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey is the contracting activity.
